author: Karnataka Bureau
text: Most forest fires are man-made, and often, the forest becomes the focal point of a grudge against the State government. The Honorary Wildlife Warden of Chamarajanagar, Naveen Kumar, said that in many cases such elements openly threaten the Forest Department personnel during disputes and hold the local officials to ransom. “This is a behavioural pattern that is increasingly being witnessed among a section of the local community. They feel encouraged due to failure of the authorities to prosecute such elements,” he said.
title: Man-made fires to settle local feud
